text: The film industry in Western Australia encompasses a wide range of productions and a wide range of filmmakers. Funding can be sourced from ScreenWest,ScreenWest, Funding & Support; by ScreenWest 2016. Retrieved 29-7-16. Screen Australia,Screen Australia, Funding and Support Overview; by Screen Australia 2016. Retrieved 29-7-16. FTI,FTI, Film Funding; by FTI 2016. Retrieved 29-7-16. television broadcasters and private investors. Filmmakers and productions can be recognised at the West Australian Screen Awards.FTI, WA Screen Awards; by FTI 2016. Retrieved 2-8-16.
